tool.name: REDItoolDnaRna
tool.description: python scripts for RNA editing detection by RNA-Seq data
tool.command:
REDItoolDnaRna
############################ ## Single/Paired file
#if $library.type == "single" or $library.type == "paired":
## Input RNA-Seq BAM file -i "$library.rna_input"
## Sort RNA-Seq #if str( $library.rna_sort ) == "true": -I #end if
#if $library.type == "paired"
## DNA-Seq file -j "$library.dna_input"
## Sort DNA-Seq #if str( $library.dna_sort ) == "true": -J #end if
#end if
## Reference data options @REFERENCE_FILE@
## Output options @OUTPUT_OPTIONS@
## Load reditools advanced options @reditools_advanced_options@
############################ ## Paired collection
#elif $library.type == "paired_collection":
## Input RNA-Seq BAM file -i "$library.rna_dna_paired_input.forward"
## Sort RNA-Seq #if str( $library.rna_sort ) == "true": -I #end if
## DNA-Seq file -j "$library.rna_dna_paired_input['reverse']"
## Sort DNA-Seq #if str( $library.dna_sort ) == "true": -J #end if
## Reference data options @REFERENCE_FILE@
## Output options @OUTPUT_OPTIONS@
## Load reditools advanced options @reditools_advanced_options@
#end if

param.name: type
param.label: Single or Paired, file or collection

param.name: dna_input
param.label: DNA-Seq BAM files separated by comma or folder containing BAM files.
param.help: Note that chromosome/region names in the reference must match chromosome/region names in BAMs files.

param.name: reference
param.label: Reference file in fasta format.
param.help: Note that each chromosome/region must be present in a single BAM file only.

param.name: list_chrm
param.label: List of chromosomes to skip
param.help: Separated by space ex: chr1 chr2

param.name: region
param.label: Work Only On Region: chrxx:start-end.
param.help: positions are distributed by the number of threads

param.name: save_list_qual
param.label: Save a list of columns with quality scores

param.name: min_map_qual_scor
param.label: Min. mapping quality score (dna rna)
param.help: Default: 30 30. For Bowtie use 255, Bowtie2 use 40, BWA use 30, RNA-STAR use 255, HiSAT2 use 60, Tophat1 use 255, Tophat2 use 50, GSNAP use 30

param.name: infer_strand
param.label: Infer strand for strand oriented reads

param.name: infer_gff
param.label: Infer strand by GFF annotation
param.help: Must be GFF and sorted, otherwise use 'Sort annotation files' option

param.name: exclude_gff
param.label: GFF File with positions to exclude
param.help: Must be GFF and sorted, otherwise use 'Sort annotation file' option

param.name: include_gff
param.label: Work only on given GFF positions
param.help: Must be GFF and sorted, otherwise use 'Sort annotation file' option

param.name: use_pair_rna
param.label: Use paired concardant reads only in RNA-Seq

param.name: use_pair_dna
param.label: Use paired concardant reads only in DNA-Seq

param.name: trim_rna
param.label: Trim x bases up and y bases down per read [0 0] in RNA-Seq

param.name: trim_dna
param.label: Trim x bases up and y bases down per read [0 0] in DNA-Seq

param.name: blat_corr_rna
param.label: Blat file for correction in RNA-Seq

param.name: blat_corr_dna
param.label: Blat file for correction in DNA-Seq

param.name: rm_subs_homo_rna
param.label: Remove substitutions in homopolymeric regions in RNA-Seq

param.name: rm_subs_homo_dna
param.label: Remove substitutions in homopolymeric regions in DNA-Seq

param.name: min_reads_sup_var
param.label: Min. num. of reads supporting the variation for RNA-Seq

param.name: ex_pos_mult_ch_rna
param.label: Exclude positions with multiple changes in RNA-Seq

param.name: ex_pos_mult_ch_dna
param.label: Exclude positions with multiple changes in DNA-Seq

param.name: list_var
param.label: Select RNA-Seq positions with defined changes (separated by space ex: AG TC)

param.name: ex_sites_not_dna
param.label: Exclude sites not supported by DNA-Seq

param.name: n_bases_near_splice
param.label: Num. of bases near splice sites to explore

param.name: fastq_files
param.label: Fastq to get reads
param.help: [requires -RR or reads], separated by space [if paired]

tool.help: This tool computes GC content from a FASTA file.
